front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Military Workplaces--Force Health Protection Regarding Personnel Exposure to Electric, Magnetic and Electromagnetic Fields, 0 Hz to 300 GHz

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard provides recommendations to protect personnel in military environments against established adverse health effects associated with exposure to electric, magnetic, and electromagnetic fields, induced and contact current, and contact and arcing voltages over the frequency range of 0 Hz to 300 GHz. C95.1-2345 replaces North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Standardization Agreement(STANAG) 2345 (Edition 3).
